title: Mindfulness & Meditation Aromatherapy Duo
author: Lesley Gorman
description: This expertly blended aromatherapy pair brings relaxing frankincense, vetiver and sandalwood together to promote a sense of calm and create a moment of mindfulness. Enjoy as an essential oil or roll-on remedy.
cleaned_text: This expertly blended aromatherapy pair brings relaxing frankincense, vetiver and sandalwood together to promote a sense of calm and create a moment of mindfulness. Enjoy as an essential oil or roll-on remedy. Aromatherapy Blend Meditation Take time out to relax when you're busy with our Meditation Aromatherapy Blend, which encourages slower, deeper breathing. Expertly blended by Neal's Yard Remedies' Director of Natural Remedies, Susan Curtis, it creates a wonderfully restful yet uplifting aroma, that can be diffused to help promote a sense of calm and focus, ready for meditation or when you want to create a moment of zen. "There is a relaxing base of vetiver and ethically sourced sandalwood to calm the active mind, the finest frankincense from Oman to deepen the breath - so important for a good meditation - and add focus, and then orange to add a lift. Finally the addition of a drop of black pepper is like a bit of magic that adds a vibrational zing to the whole blend."- Susan Curtis - Relaxing - Add to a diffuser to enhance mindfulness practice - Certified organic Remedies to Roll Meditation This on the go aromatherapy blend is the perfect way to encourage mindfulness throughout the day. The relaxing aromas of frankincense, vetiver and sandalwood come together to create a moment of inner calm for a feeling of enhanced wellbeing. Keep in your handbag and apply throughout the day to help you to pause, take a breath, and enjoy the moment. - Expertly blended aroma to delicately scent the skin. - Creates a moment of inner calm. - Perfect when on the go. Aromatherapy Blend Meditation Ingredients Copaifera Officinalis (Balsam Copaiba) ingredients: 100% natural origin, 98.2% organic.
